ThreadLocker.h

00001 #ifndef COM_AFRIGIS_UTIL_THREAD_THREADLOCKER_H_
00002 #define COM_AFRIGIS_UTIL_THREAD_THREADLOCKER_H_
00003 //If you use the pthread uncomment the following block of code
00004 /* //PThreadBlock
00005 #define _P_THREAD
00006 #include <pthread/pthread.h>
00007 
00008 extern pthread_mutex_t Global_Mutex_Lock;
00009 
00010 #define _CLThreadLock() pthread_mutex_lock(&Global_Mutex_Lock)
00011 #define _CLThreadUnLock() pthread_mutex_unlock(&Global_Mutex_Lock)
00012 
00013 //*/ //PThreadBlock
00014 
00015 //For Boost Thread uncomment the following block of code
00016 
00017 /* //BoostThreadBlock
00018 //#include <boost/thread/thread.hpp>
00019 //#include <boost/thread/mutex.hpp>
00020 extern boost::mutex Global_Mutex_Lock;
00021 #define _CLThreadLock() boost::mutex::scoped_lock lock(Global_Mutex_Lock)
00022 #define _CLThreadUnLock() 
00023 //*/ 
00024 
00025 
00026 //define this two macros according to the threaded system you are using
00027 //for your application
00028 
00029 #endif //COM_AFRIGIS_UTIL_THREAD_THREADLOCKER_H_
